description: Indigo Renderer and Indigo RT are 3D apps that allow artists to create photorealistic images. However, Indigo RT offers fewer features and is less expensive than Indigo Renderer.

Various Glare Technologies apps can create PIGS files, including the standalone version of Indigo Renderer and the plugin version. The Indigo Renderer plugin is available for several 3D modeling products, including 3ds Max, Blender, Cinema 4D, and Maya.

You can create a PIGS file with Indigo Renderer when saving a scene you want to share or store. To create a PIGS file with Indigo Renderer, open an IGS file, select File â†’ Save Scene As , then select "Packed Indigo Scene" from the file type dropdown menu.
